Title: Lalbaug Parel: Zali Mumbai Sonyachi
Actors: Vinay Apte, Seema Biswas, Ankush Chaudhari, Anusha Dhandekar
Plot: Lalbaug Parel was released on 23 April, 2010. Produced by Arun Rangachari & directed by Mahesh Manjrekar. Movie highlights the atrocities towards the mill workers, totally ignored by the Government and its consequences.
